original_text: If poor people needed help, I helped them like their father would do. I spoke on behalf of strangers to help them get justice. If poor people needed help,
korean_text: 빈궁한 자의 아버지도 되며 내가 모르는 사람의 송사를 돌보아 주었으며

sentences.original_text: I helped them like their father would do.
sentences.korean_translation: 나는 그들의 아버지가 할 것처럼 그들을 도왔다.

sentences.original_text: I spoke on behalf of strangers
